client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

loans.description: A list of loans to update.

loan_id.description:
A unique identifier for the loan.
Personally identifiable information, such as an email address or phone number, should not be used in the `loan_id`.

status_history.description: A list of status update history of the loan.

items.description: Contains the status and date of an update to the loan.

date.description: The effective date for the status of the loan. The date should be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

payment_history.description: The updates to the payment history for the loan.

items.description: Contains the payment information for a loan payment period.

period.description:
The index to identify the loan's payment period, starting from 1.
For example:
  1 means the period between the loan's opening date and the 1st payment due date.
  2 means the period between the loan's 1st payment due date and 2nd payment due date.

due_date.description: The payment due date or end date of the payment period. The date should be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

days_past_due.description:
The number of days the loan was delinquent at the end of the pay period.
If specified, should be greater of equal to 0.

amount_past_due.description: The amount past due or the charge-off amount of the loan at the end of the payment period.

balance_remaining.description: The balance remaining on the loan at the end of the payment period.
